===Definitions===
{{zh-hanzi}}

# to [[dare]] (to); to [[venture]] (to)
#: {{zh-x|我們 必須 敢 想，敢 說，敢 幹。|We must '''dare to''' think, speak up and act.}}
#: {{zh-x|他 不 敢 正 眼看 她。|He didn't '''dare to''' look at her in the face.}}
#: {{zh-x|在 那 個 風雨 交加 的 夜晚，很 少 有人 敢 出去。|Very few people '''ventured to''' go out on that stormy night.}}
#: {{zh-x|你 敢 坐 飛機 飛行 嗎？|Will you '''venture''' a flight in an air plane?}}
# to be sure; to be certain
#: {{zh-x|敢 肯定|to be sure, to be certain}}
#: {{zh-x|敢 說|to be sure, to be certain}}
#: {{zh-x|我 敢 說，你 解決 不 了 這 個 難題。|I bet you can't do this puzzle.}}
# [[bold]]; [[brave]]
